column5: Were back from a nice 5 day trip to Kesagami Wilderness Lodge.  Got to see Avery.. I'm working on a full post but its gonna be a day or two before I am able to sort through all the pictures.. BUT  I put this video together of Moniques PB Northern! Small walleye rod, 8 lb fluorocarbon and NO leader!
Way to go, Girl! Awesome catch! And the fish is pretty cute too!
LOL I hope your talking about me and NOT the guide...
Nice fish, congrat's to Monique! Pickeral Point? That spot looks awfully familiar.
Mike... lol.. there a reason the big ones are there.. we pulled up easily 70 pickeral before landing that one...
and that was in a couple of hours...  I LOVE listening to that line peeeeeeellllllll.....

Pink!!!  Pink!!!  Pink!!!  Take one color grub for walleye to Kesagami and it HAS to have pink.  Not an incidental catch by any means either, 1/3 of Kesagami's 40+ inch fish are caught when fishing light for walleye.  Cool video.  Betchya Monique's knees were shaking just a little reeling that beauty in.
Outfished again eh TJ. LOL.  Nice fish. Thanks for putting the vid up.
Great fish,no leader,who knows what you get.Bringing that one in.Well very nice!!!Congrats sweet.
Imagine that you have been outfished again. Good Job Monique.   Art
Saw the video on Facebook!  Awesome catch for Monique!!  One question.  Who was the schoolgirl who shot the video?
That i an awesome video of an exceptionally well fought fish. The drag on the reel was perfectly set. Good stuff!

Funny you say that... the day before we lost a nice one.. well Monique lost a nice one cause i decided to adjust the drag mid fight.... now theres a lesson learned... it was pretty quiet in that boat for a while.....
That's great! Awesome fish, thanks for sharing Tj
Good job.  Thanx for the video
